info.name: darkish-diaspora
info.description: darkish theme for diaspora social network
info.additionalInfo:
v0.1 First release.
only 8 pods urls associated with the style ATM. Glitches may occur because I haven't covered all the elements yet.
v0.2 over 10 pods added, styled comments a bit
v0.3 fixed css properties for firefox, some minor tweaks
v0.4 fixed comment area that was not resizing when type in. thx to @Shmerl
v0.5 added diaspora-fr.org pod
